code: import CartActionTypes from'./cart.types';export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:CartActionTypes.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var decreaseItem=function decreaseItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.DECREASE_ITEM,payload:item};};
